description: Enables fast snapshot restores for the specified snapshots in the specified Availability Zones. You get the full benefit of fast snapshot restores after they enter the enabled state. To get the current state of fast snapshot restores, use  DescribeFastSnapshotRestores. To disable fast snapshot restores, use  DisableFastSnapshotRestores. For more information, see Amazon EBS fast snapshot restore in the Amazon EBS User Guide.

parameters.name: AvailabilityZones
parameters.description: One or more Availability Zones. For example, us-east-2a. (string) ---

parameters.name: SourceSnapshotIds
parameters.description: The IDs of one or more snapshots. For example, snap-1234567890abcdef0. You can specify a snapshot that was shared with you from another Amazon Web Services account. (string) ---

nested_items.name: Successful
nested_items.description: Information about the snapshots for which fast snapshot restores were successfully enabled.

nested_items.name: SnapshotId
nested_items.description: The ID of the snapshot.

nested_items.name: AvailabilityZone
nested_items.description: The Availability Zone.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of fast snapshot restores.

nested_items.name: StateTransitionReason
nested_items.description: The reason for the state transition. The possible values are as follows:
Client.UserInitiated - The state successfully transitioned to enabling or disabling.
Client.UserInitiated - Lifecycle state transition - The state successfully transitioned to optimizing, enabled, or disabled.

nested_items.name: OwnerId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that enabled fast snapshot restores on the snapshot.

nested_items.name: OwnerAlias
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services owner alias that enabled fast snapshot restores on the snapshot. This is intended for future use.

nested_items.name: EnablingTime
nested_items.description: The time at which fast snapshot restores entered the enabling state.

nested_items.name: OptimizingTime
nested_items.description: The time at which fast snapshot restores entered the optimizing state.

nested_items.name: EnabledTime
nested_items.description: The time at which fast snapshot restores entered the enabled state.

nested_items.name: DisablingTime
nested_items.description: The time at which fast snapshot restores entered the disabling state.

nested_items.name: DisabledTime
nested_items.description: The time at which fast snapshot restores entered the disabled state.

nested_items.name: Unsuccessful
nested_items.description: Information about the snapshots for which fast snapshot restores could not be enabled.

nested_items.name: SnapshotId
nested_items.description: The ID of the snapshot.

nested_items.name: FastSnapshotRestoreStateErrors
nested_items.description: The errors.

nested_items.name: AvailabilityZone
nested_items.description: The Availability Zone.

nested_items.name: Code
nested_items.description: The error code.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: The error message.
